name: HellTower-BH-JAM
description:
Welcome to HellTower! You're a DragonFly that has been plucked from the wild by the evil Wizard Sezotove to use as  spell a component or some other reagent. You must try to survive as long a possible flying through HellTower. Unknown to the Wizard however, you're a DragonFly from the Fae Wilds that has a taste for mana and spell elements. Every 10 seconds you can eat/absorb the different spell projectiles to score points!

-WASD To move

-Avoid spell projectiles unless you can eat them!

-Restart Screen does NOT work. I dont know why and ran out of time.

This is my first actual game and I wish I could have done more. On day 1 I was out for surgery on my dominant wrist(right) and have had a brace on and mostly been 1 handed typing while trying to make this game. It was a struggle and some things are missing but it's as far as I could get it in time.
